Value.label: Set to Default
Value.Help: Set all configuration values to default values (factory settings).

Value.label: Button Type
Value.Help: The way how the button reacts when press/released

Item.label: Toggle light when button is pressed, no action when button is released.
Toggle light when button is released, Start dimming when button pressed.
Toggle light when button is pressed and when button is Released, start dimming when quickly press and release button.

Value.label: Control Type
Value.Help: The way the Built-in Dimmer reacts when light is turned on/off with button

Item.label: Switch own light on and send a Z-Wave message to all associated nodes (direct and extern)
Don.t switch own light on but only send a Z-Wave message to associated node. (extern only)

Value.label: Dimming enabled
Value.Help: This parameter is used to enable the dimming option of the product. When disabled the dimming and fading routine are disabled.

Value.label: Maximum Powerload
Value.Help: The maximum powerload in watts when light is turned on, when measured higher then this value the Inline Dimmer is automatically turned off.

Value.label: Dimming Speed
Value.Help: The speed of dimming when activated (manual and RF). Dim speed is 1% per value (* 10 ms)

Value.label: Fading up Speed
Value.Help: The speed of fading up when activated (manual and RF). Fade speed is 1% per value (* 10 ms)

Value.label: Toggle time
Value.Help: The time window to repress button to start dimming. Toggle time is value (* 10ms)

Value.label: Auto meter report: percentage
Value.Help: A percentage that an energy value must be different compared to a previous sent value before an unsolicited meter report is sent. Minimum value = 10% Maximum value = 100%

Value.label: Auto meter report: watt
Value.Help: A watt value that an energy value must be different compared to a previous sent value before an unsolicited meter report is sent. Minimum value = 5 watt Maximum value = 255 watt

Value.label: Auto meter report: time
Value.Help: A time value that has to be passed compared to a previous sent value before a unsolicited meter report is sent. Minimum value = 10 seconds Maximum value = 255 seconds

Value.label: Last known status
Value.Help: What to do with lamp status when power applied. If 0x00: Always switch light off when power applied. If > 0x00: Switch lamp on/off depending on last known lampstatus before power was disconnected.

Value.label: Fading down speed
Value.Help: The speed of fading up when activated (manual and RF). Fade speed is 1% per value (* 10 ms)

Group.label: Group 1: All nodes in this group will receive a BASIC_SET frame when light is set to a certain state with the button of the Built-in Dimmer (manual switching).

Group 2: The node associated in this group will receive a SWITCH_MULTILEVEL_REPORT frame every time the level of light is changed, where the value represents the (changed) dim level. The status is reported after every change that means manual but also if changed by Z-Wave. The node in this group will also received the (auto) METER_REPORT.
Group 3: If configured that the control mode is extern only (configuration param3, value 1) then a BASIC_SET frame is sent to the node in this group when the button is changed.
